item.name: Chapman Valley Wines
item.address1: Lot 14 Howatharra Road, Nanson, Chapman Valley via Geraldton, WA 6530
item.description: Chapman Valley Wines is WAs most northern winery, situated 30km northeast of Geraldton in the picturesque valley which gives the business its name. A hobby vineyard on a nearby property led to the establishment of 5ha of vines in 1995, followed by a further 3ha in 99 comprising semillon, chenin blanc, chardonnay, verdelho, sauvignon blanc, shiraz, merlot, cabernet sauvignon and zinfandel.
